Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
AccountManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a Account Manager that creates Admin/Student's accounts and validates the login process of the application. The account password is hashed by one of the method of the Account Manager class.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • bytesToHex

      public static java.lang.String bytesToHex​(byte[] hash)
      Static method that converts byte arrays to hexadecimals.
      Parameters:
      hash - Byte arrays to be converted.
      Returns:
      Hexadecimal strings after the conversion.

    • getHash

      public static java.lang.String getHash​(java.lang.String originalString)
      Static method that hashs a String. (Password) for our case.
      Parameters:
      originalString - Password of an Admin/Student's account.
      Returns:
      Hashed password.

    • addAccount

      public static boolean addAccount​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Static method that adds an account and store it in an binary text file.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the account to be added.
      password - Hashed password of the account to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the new account is successfully added. False when the username to be added has already exist in the database.

    • validateAccount

      public static boolean validateAccount​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isStaff)
      Static method that validates the account login process of an User(Admin/Student).
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the account.
      password - Password of the account.
      isStaff - True if Admin, false if Student.
      Returns:
      True when login is successful, otherwise false.
